title: Ode to Icky
description: For ages 3-9.. . What do you do when your cat is so disgusting and stinky that you can't stand to be within 15 feet of him? If you are like Icky's owner, Candy, you find a way to make it work for you! But as Candy soon finds out, sometimes our best ideas can also be our worst!
author: Maranda Russell
